# REFERENCES/AGENTS.md

This folder contains a few OSS codebases included for reference only.
They exist to help inform design decisions and implementation patterns
when building PayKit.

**Do not edit any files in this directory.** Read-only references only.

## Codebases

- **better-auth** â€” A TypeScript authentication framework with a similar
  monorepo structure, plugin architecture, and adapter pattern (DB adapters,
  provider adapters). Useful reference for how to structure the core library,
  write adapters, and expose a clean plugin API.
